name: portfolio
description: Full-stack serverless portfolio with AWS Amplify - Cloud architecture, AI/ML, and DevSecOps expertise.

scripts.deploy:amplify: cd infrastructure/amplify && npx ampx pipeline-deploy --branch master --app-id dzecmyr42457
scripts.build: echo 'Frontend is static HTML/CSS/JS - no build step required' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r apps/web/* dist/
scripts.build:backend: cd infrastructure/amplify && npm ci && cd functions/contact-handler && npm ci
scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run build:backend && npm run build:web && npm run build:admin
scripts.validate: npm run lint:check && npm run format:check
scripts.prepare: echo "Husky hooks can be installed here"
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ build/ node_modules/.cache apps/*/dist packages/*/dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules infrastructure/amplify/node_modules
